root: ^???: You know you can't win this, right? And, hey, maybe that's for the best - the "win" outcome is pretty twisted after all."
^???: Tch, of course you don't understand. How could you?
^???: What "we"? There is no "we", anymore. You're welcome for that, by the way.
^???: ... Y'know, that's fair. Given what you think you know. But you'll see, [NAME]. When you see the outcome, you'll understand that this really is for the best.
^???: You kinda look like you wanna punch me right now... Or maybe you're just speechless? Maybe a bit of both? I was never great at reading you, [NAME].
^???: What're you gonna do, [NAME]? You're running out of juice. What're we at now? Like, eight-seven?
^???: I'm betting... this'll be your last chance, huh?
^NAME: ( [He's/She's/They're] right... I'm running on fumes at this point... )
^NAME: Even if that means I have to stop all of them, too.
^NAME: ( I hoped it wouldn't come to this... But you know what they say: Hope for the best, prepare for the worst. )
